Name: Milk Chocolate Vanilla Nut Bonbon
Description: A sugary bonbon made with a hard milk chocolate shell over vanilla creme and walnuts.

NameLocalization.zh: 牛奶巧克力香草核桃夹心

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 단단한 밀크초콜렛에 바닐라크림을 채우고 호두를 곁들인 달콤한 봉봉.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ein zuckerhaltiger Bonbon aus einer harten Milchschokoladenschale über Vanillecreme und Walnüssen.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 稍硬的牛奶巧克力包裹着香草奶油以及核桃。“吃了会不会变聪明呢？”
